RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:On Error Resume Next&echo:Set wmi = GetObject(^"winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2^"^)&echo:Set drive = wmi.Get(^"Win32_DiskDrive.DeviceID='\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0'^"^)&echo:If Err.Number ^<^> 0 Then&echo:Msgbox Err.Description)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If&echo:If drive.InterfaceType = ^"IDE^" Or drive.InterfaceType = ^"SCSI^" Then&echo:WScript.Quit 0&echo:Else&echo:MsgBox ^"Assertion failed.^"&echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If)"

Extensions.File: HKCU = &H80000001 key = "Control Panel\NotifyIconSettings" Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") If reg.EnumKey(HKCU, key, names) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(names) Then For Each name In names reg.SetDWORDValue HKCU, key + "\" + name, "IsPromoted", 1 Next End If End If
